sentences.en: An acrobat has to be agile.
sentences.cn: 杂技演员必须身手敏捷.

sentences.en: At 20 years old he was not as agile as he is now.
sentences.cn: 20岁时他并不如现在这般矫健。

sentences.en: He had too incisive and agile a mind.
sentences.cn: 他的思路过于犀利敏捷.

sentences.en: He is agile in his movements.
He was quick and agile and he didn't mind losing.
sentences.cn: 他敏捷,灵活,输了不在乎.

sentences.en: It is axiomatic that as people grow older they generally become less agile.
sentences.cn: 人年纪越大通常灵活性越差，这是不言而喻的。

sentences.en: On land the turtle is ungainly, but in the water it isvery agile.
sentences.cn: 龟在陆地上行动笨拙, 在水里则很灵活.

sentences.en: One need an agile mind to solve puzzles.
sentences.cn: 解迷必须有机灵的头脑.

sentences.en: She is such an agile dancer!
sentences.cn: 她跳起舞来是那么灵巧!

sentences.en: She was quick-witted and had an extraordinarily agile mind.
sentences.cn: 她机智聪慧，思维极为敏捷。

sentences.en: The boy has an agile mind.
The kid is as agile as a hare.
sentences.cn: 这孩子像狡兔一样灵敏.

sentences.en: The problem that he answers newsman is very agile.
sentences.cn: 他回答新闻记者的问题很灵活.

sentences.en: The third, a long - legged creature, was more obstinate and agile.
sentences.cn: 第三只却因为腿长, 更倔强,更俏利.

sentences.en: Well , he's getting on now , and isn't as agile as he was.
sentences.cn: 他年事渐高, 而且不象过去那样灵活了.

phrases.tran_cn: 敏捷开发；敏捷式软体开发

trans.tran_cn: 灵巧的，轻快的，灵活的，机敏的
trans.tran_en: able to move quickly and easily
